name: [TextBased] Space Explorer
description:
This is one of my games that I have created back in High School with two of my friends/classmates.

Space Explorer:

-Type "help" to get a list of commands.

-Backstory: You were flying through space on your own mission when you realize you forgot to stop for fuel. You look for anything to help you and find an abandoned spaceship. You can either choose to go in there or leave. The choice is yours.
